sections.description: Versatile technology leader with 16+ years of progressive experience spanning from customer service management to senior technical leadership. Transformed from a customer-focused manager into a Lead Web Developer, demonstrating adaptability and continuous learning mindset. Passionate about building scalable applications, mentoring teams, and driving technical excellence through solution architecture and modern development practices.
summary: Proven leadership track record with experience managing teams and driving technical initiatives across multiple domains
Expert in React.js ecosystem and modern frontend development with strong focus on design systems and component architecture
Full-stack developer with solution architecture expertise, capable of designing scalable applications from concept to deployment
Demonstrated career transformation from customer service management to technical leadership, showcasing adaptability and growth mindset
Experienced in test automation and quality assurance, ensuring robust and reliable software delivery
Strong advocate for team mentoring and knowledge sharing, committed to elevating development practices and code quality standards
sections.title: Summary
